'''1.21.6 Pre-Release 4''' (known as '''1.21.6-pre4''' in the launcher) is the fourth and final [[pre-release]] for [[Java Edition 1.21.6]], released on June 10, 2025.<ref>{{Mcnet|minecraft-1-21-6-pre-release-4|Minecraft 1.21.6 Pre-Release 4|June 10, 2025}}</ref>

== Fixes ==
{{fixes|project=MC|fixedin=1.21.6 Pre-Release 4
|;From 1.21.2
|279417|Luring mobs onto blocks at Y{{=}}-64 will instead make them pathfind to the highest elevation.
|;dev
|298446|The "Thunder roars" sound is no longer affected by the master volume.
|298510|Happy ghasts stay still for a few seconds when you get off them.
|;prev
|298653|Master volume slider no longer affects {{cmd|playsound}} sounds with high volume.
}}</onlyinclude>
